data.name: LayoutManagerEvents
desc: provides information about layout manager events
Events are provided only for notification purposes only.

items.name: LOCK
lines: specifies that the layout manager processed a lock call, which prevents it from doing layouts.
This event sends the current lock count as additional information.

items.name: UNLOCK
lines: specifies that the layout manager processed an unlock call, which admit layouts when the lock count is zero.
This event sends the current lock count as additional information.

items.name: LAYOUT
lines: specifies that the layout manager refreshed the layout of the frame.
This event sends no additional information.

items.name: VISIBLE
lines: specifies that the layout manager container frame window becomes visible.
This event sends no additional information.

items.name: INVISIBLE
lines: specifies that the layout manager container frame window becomes invisible.
This event sends no additional information.

items.name: MERGEDMENUBAR
lines: A merged menu bar has been set at the layout manager.
This event sends no additional information.

items.name: UIELEMENT_VISIBLE
lines: specifies that a certain user interface element has been made visible
This event sends the resource url of the newly visible user interface element.

items.name: UIELEMENT_INVISIBLE
lines: specifies that a certain user interface element has been made invisible
This event sends the resource url of the invisible user interface element.
